reviews.review:
On low levels as survivor your team is borderline catatonic. When you get hooked playing with random people you will see your teamates hiding in a locker, self-healing miles away from you, or spinning in circles while crouching. 

On high levels of survivor play you just slam gens and if a killer chases you then just run from tile to tile knowing that for a killer to commit to downing you it will cost them at least 2 gens. That is for one hook. It takes 3 hooks to kill a survivor and more catches considering the second chance perks. 5 gens and the game is over and there are 4 survivors. If that doesn't seem like it maths out right it is because it doesn't.  

The DEVs (being the coke fiends they are) only care about collecting IPs to draw in new player$. Therefor they balance the game on making it "fun" for them. 

The effect of this "balancing" is that the veteran survivors get to dance all over killers. Whilst the veteran killers get to just bite down and eat it. I think veteran survivors mains do not even comprehend the skill differential. They think "oh I am really good look how easy this is" not "the game has clearly been babyfied for new players making this game functionally one-sided on upper level play". 

There are no killer sided maps (depending on who you play), two thirds of the maps are survivor biased and the remaining could be called fair. If you disagree with this you are wrong full stop. You might be thinking "oh I see the numbers from XXX and it looks fair to me". Those numbers are mostly new players who skew the results to make this look like a balanced game.

Additionally, there is a chat filter that has gone far and away from anything anyone would call appropriate. Common (non-inflammatory) words are blocked from chat. "You **** ****** me" instead of "You face camped me". How many 8-balls do you need to do for this to seem like a competent decision?  

TLDR the DEVs are so comically incompetent that this game would not be profitable if it were not for the fact it has cool IPs, and the fact that it is the only one of it's kind (RIP F13).

心跳girl

I felt compelled to write a review simply because the devs are always getting dumped on by the playbase in spite of constantly providing free updates and fixes.

As other reviews allude to, the community is pretty toxic. Both in terms of survivor mains and killer mains griping about one another, and in terms of the playerbase flipping out about every change that's made and complaining about the devs constantly. But you know what's hilarious? The number of people giving negative reviews and citing these things who have over 1000 hours in game and are still playing it.

Good value for money, it's fun for streamers/competitive types as well as casuals and party gamers. A great mix of stealth, hide and seek, and actions/chasing. It is still actively updated, and the developers regularly put on community events to keep things interesting and attract players, and they even recently released free full DLC with a new killer, survivor and map for a year old game (that of course the ungrateful playerbase complained about, not cognizant of the fact that it's new and will require some patching to be balanced after seeing how things play out).

This is survivor-specific, but I also love the teamwork, alturism and moral choices that arise organically. Even without any in game chat function (during the rounds themselves), I feel a sense of obligation to help people who saved me earlier even when I have the opportunity to make a clean break and trying to assist them is very dangerous. I love that the game makes me feel that way, and there are times I actually agonize a bit about whether to go on a suicidal rescue mission to save someone out of gratitude or bail on them with a rare item I want to keep.

Oh, and since everyone complains about killers camping: as a survivor main, I just wanted to say that's a suboptimal strategy for killers. Don't sweat it, just punish the killers by getting some generators done while they waste their time standing by the hook.

不推荐，不推荐，不推荐！！！看别人直播和自己玩是两回事！！！
列出以下几点原因。

1.匹配机制有着极其严重的问题。对你没看错，极其严重！
各种被抓壮丁，我18段要我去和1段的人玩？给别人提供快感？？？

总结就是一句话，双方技术根本就不在一个水平，游戏体验都很差。

 2.说下个人感受，对新人一点不友好。
国服没人，排队要很久。想要匹配速度快点要去外服，花钱买加速器不说，外服看见你中文名字，基本上都不会救你甚至故意恶心你。玩屠夫也经常遇见各种3排4排的车队，各种速修，为了修而修。

3.开发商已经放弃国服了。
国服玩家严重流失。
开发商重心就迁去了日韩。国服完全放弃了。后面出的全是带有浓重日韩风味的DLC。你品，你细细品
而且你要玩国服，基本上没什么人。玩外服，花钱买加速器吧，还要顶着几十上百的延迟和别人玩。

4.DLC和皮肤出的速度是越来越快，吃相是越来越难看了。

活下去 杀机 求求你们 让杀机活下去吧

黎明杀机真的是一个好游戏 从游戏刚出就开始关注了 那个时候 大家都很傻 人吓屠夫 屠夫吓人 屠夫会被突然砸下的板子吓的扔飞鼠标 比如我 人类听到心跳就慌的不行 哎呀呀呀 屠夫在哪？ 他看到我了没？

不久 人类开始琢磨出各种6屠夫的办法 屠夫也想出各种套路 对付人类 从一个个修电机都能被吓到的萌新 变成了一个个能6屠夫5台电机的大佬 
从生存环境上来说 制作商不停的削弱人类 而人类6屠夫的脚步却一天也没天下来 屠夫开始变的 成熟 用各种套路 制裁哪些骚人族 砍人不眨眼 用各种追杀技巧 和人类斗智斗勇

制作商对中国玩家也很好 从很快就有的汉化来说 凭就这一点我就买杀机 后来在中国游戏卖的好了 制作商也没有忘记中国玩家 投票开始制作中国屠夫 一开始我知道的时候 还以为又是什么奇怪的游戏靠教授蹭热度 结果一看！哎呀 这不杀机嘛？！这么友好的制作商 点赞！

不过 久了 游戏都会玩腻吧 恶劣的外挂 致命的BUG\ 还有恶意的屠夫 拔线的人类 都导致了游戏环境的恶化 当前游戏人数的减少 越来越少的萌新加入

Dead by Daylight es un juego original que ha tenido mucho éxito en PC y amplía su terreno para poder llegar a los jugadores de consolas y que es capaz de transmitirnos ese miedo que sentiríamos al ser acechados por un cruel asesino. Para tener una mayor sensación de inmersión es muy recomendable jugar con auriculares para una mayor experiencia en el juego. En más de una ocasión apretaremos los dientes y el mando entre nuestras manos al saber que nos acecha un asesino invencible.

En la mayoría de juegos online es habitual que un usuario se desconecte cuando va perdiendo para no perder puntos, y así nosotros tampoco los ganamos. En Dead by Daylight esto se ve paliado con una puntuación a modo de Bonificación por desconexión. Algo que la mayoría de los jugadores de Dead by Daylight lo agradecerán.

En resumen, nos encontramos ante un título original y diferente a lo que hemos visto hasta la fecha, que quizá pueda parecer que se haga repetitivo pero que genera esa necesidad de echar algunas partidas antes de jugar a otro juego. Todos sus componentes, el equilibrio entre los jugadores de ambos bandos y la dinámica del juego hace de Dead by Daylight un juego francamente divertido, que tardará bastante en cansarnos, asegurándonos muchas horas de juego. Una muy buena inversión a un buen precio, 

Pros:
Juego original y divertido.
La variedad de asesinos y sus habilidades únicas.
Recoge la esencia de las películas slashers.

Contras:
El apartado gráfico no es de lo más puntero
El campeo está muy presente en este juego.
Puede ser difícil subir porque podemos perder experiencia según la partida.

Podéis leer mi análisis completo en http://generacionxbox.com/analisis-dead-by-daylight/

What can i say about this amazing game? Lots.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
The gameplay in dead by daylight is fun, and has well thought out mechanics and balances. First of all, perks are very balanced, making the Pros of the perks good enought to be used and the Cons of the perk strong enough to make it a fair fight.

[h1]Playing as a survivor[/h1]
Playing a survivor in this game is incredibly scary, to start off with, but as soon as you get to know the game better the fear turns into adrenaline, which is what i love about this game. Trust me, it's a lot scarier when you know what you [b]Should[/b] be doing, but can't. The perks make it hell for the killer to catch you but yet every match i still seem to die. Maybe the game is killer sided? Or maybe im just shit. you will never know. (unless you play with me, then you will know its definatly because im shit)

[h1]Playing as the killer[/h1]
Playing as the killer at first is very frustrating as it seems like everyone is better than you. but when you get used to the mechanics, things become a lot easier. Bloodlust is by far the most amazing thing in this game. (bloodlust is when if you are chasing a survivor for a long period of time, you slowly start to increase in speed.) This makes sure that the survivors have to use their surroundings as they cant just out run you. The various killers have different abilities which allow them to kill the survivors in creative ways.

Over all the game is very buggy, but the authors are releasing patches nearly every week. a lot of content is added regularilly and i really do believe this could become an E-Sport.

I would gladly pay £30 for this game, in it's current state, so being able to buy it for 15 quid really is a steal. I would reccomend this game for anyone who loves slash em up games, and strategy/skill based survival.

9.8/10

Конечно же я не рекомендую данную дрянь людям которые ихотят поиграть на выживших. Разработчики - аутисты. Я не первый день играю и могу заявить точно - они фиксят баги используемые выжившими и сосут у маньяков апая их всевозможно. Новая Free2Play глава подчеркнула отсутсвие мозгов у создателей маньячки. Искренне желаю смерти создателю данного маньяка. Играть против нее стало просто невозможным. Короче уроды вы - разрабы.  10 радужных топоров из 10! Искренне надеюсь что ваша игра загнется после выхода новой главы.
Но это еще не все. вам может попасться маньяк который естественно хостит лобби. У него будет пинг больше 300 и о чудо! Вы будете летать по карте в разные стороны не зависимо от вашего интернета. Даже если вы сиди с WiFi NASSA. Зато у маньячка все будет прекрасно! 
Так и это еще не все! Лобби ищется по 20-30 минут, часто вылетает, когда ливает маньяк вы теряете все что взяли с собой в катку, маньяки бьют уже будучи оглушенными, маньяк оглушенный доской не сбрасывает выжившего, маньяки ходят через доски и многое - многое другое вы можете увидеть в этой игре которую как бы начали релизовывать хорошо, но потом разработчики заболели дополнительной хромомсомой.

Dead by Daylight embodies what it truly means to 'survive the nightmare'. A highly addictive multiplayer game makes this a great entry to any horror gamer's library. But please be aware that is all this game is - multiplayer. Characters are fleshed out a little in their backstories you can read, however there is no single player plot.

Instead, the aim of the game is to simply a) escape the killing ground as a survivor by powering up generators to open the gates or b) as the killer, put the survivors in the dying state and then 'hook' them onto sacrificial meat hooks for the entity. Every character has their own perks that you can choose along with individual items which will enhance your character.  While the objectives sound simple every game changes based on the random teammates you have, player experience level as that killer, items attached/perks active,  etc. etc. 

While I recommend this game, this game is not for the faint of heart or anyone squeamish towards blood. It will leave you chilled at times after seeing fellow survivors sacrificed or the killer hunting relentlessly for you. Both being the killer and survivor offer their own unique expereince that encourages high replay value of this title to perfect your approach with each character. The variety of characters, environments, and varying conditions for each game are simply amazing. Hunt on my friends and watch out - the entity knows you're here.

我觉得我以一个不怎么会玩的人并且只玩逃生者的立场写这个评论  这是个很好的游戏 我记得刚出的时候我就玩了一次当时说实话游戏特别卡 网卡游戏叶卡。嗯 现在不存在了的。反正我是排1分钟不到就有人了的 最快的大约10秒就进了的。现在貌似很少排到外国人了都是国人也好 不卡。从之前的听到心跳就瞎跑到现在的按兵不动哈哈哈 。从以前的把把死 到现在的偶尔就我一个人逃生 真的有很多感想 。希望这个游戏能一直走下去。制作者加油！
кемперство

Quite nice but needs some balancing patches.
Other than that its a really nice conecept and idea but the devs ruin it.
Sometimes because of a bug your whole progress resets , like everything just goes back to the way you first launched it.
And they dont even answer the e-mails just the auto message tells you that ''they are looking into your issue'' and thats it
your whole progress and hardwork is gone.
To sum it up : A good game made by bad developers

This is a great game, even after 700 hours it can still suprise, excite and terrify you. The game play is different depending on which side (killer/survivour) you play as. Survivour gameplay tends to be smoother with moments of extreme pressure, while killer gameplay is a steady amount of pressure. In short survivour has more highs and lows and killer is more balanced. Playing survivour you never know whether or not you'll survive until the last second, but for killer you can usually tell if your winning or losing half way in the game. The feeling of juking a killer, getting a close save, and downing a survivour is an amazing feeling.
